About Me

Hello! I'm Peter, a tech-savvy instructional designer with a passion for pushing eLearning to its limits.

My Journey

I got my start in the eLearning space working as a writer for AllenComm in the summer of 2019. I soon realized the field aligned well with my passions: writing, education, and technology.

While I've always loved teaching, I found presenting in front of a classroom rewarding at first, but draining in the long run. Learning of this industry in my new position, I found my passion for education renewed, and set myself a new goal: becoming an eLearning expert.

After landing my first few projects through upwork and my personal network, I was able to quickly build my portfolio and saw my competence and reputation expand. I've continued learning everyday, building my portfolio, and sharing what I learned with others at AllenComm, which has helped my workload grow and stay consistently busy.

My Skill Set

My skill set falls into three main categories: instructional design, writing, and web development. I've gained my knowledge of instructional design from my own online research and practical experience on projects; I've always been an avid writer; and I attended the coding school, DevMountain, in 2019. Through building multiple projects with custom code and implementing elements of accelerated learning, I have been able to gain competency in many related technologies.
